Min Int8
===

> Minimum signed 8-bit integer.

<!-- <usage> -->
## Usage

``` javascript
var INT8_MIN = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/int8-min' );
```

#### INT8_MIN

Minimum signed 8-bit integer.

``` javascript
INT8_MIN === (-1 * Math.pow(2,7));
```

<!-- </usage> -->

<!-- <examples> -->
## Examples

``` javascript
var INT8_MIN = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/int8-min' );

console.log( INT8_MIN );
// returns -128
```

<!-- </examples> -->
